resources.string: PayPal business makes it easy to manage your activity, check your balance, send invoices, view customer information and analyse sales trends. Any time. Anywhere.
For businesses on the go. Send invoices, track sales and manage your money with the PayPal Business app.
Manage your Working Capital business loan
o Access your customer information quickly and easily
Make, send and manage invoices quickly from the PayPal Business app. PayPal\'s invoice maker makes it easy to send payment reminders to customers directly from your mobile.
See your daily sales and view your business\' monthly, quarterly and yearly sales at a glance.
Move money to your linked bank account, issue refunds and send money in just a few clicks. Manage your money on your mobile.
MAKE REPAYMENTS TOWARDS YOUR WORKING CAPITAL BUSINESS LOAN
Have a PayPal Working Capital Business Loan\? Now you can make repayments and track your repayment progress from the PayPal business app.
View customer transaction history, contact details and get in touch with your customers directly from your mobile. It\'s easy to import your contacts too!
The PayPal Business app gives your small business a quick and easy way to make and send invoices, get paid and manage your money on your mobile.
Want to accept cards on your mobile\? Try the PayPal Here app.
send money, get paid, payment, bank, transfer, sales, insights, customer, invoice maker, invoice, free, pay
Thanks for using PayPal business. We\'ve fixed bugs and crashes to help make your experience better every day.
Managing your businesses will be easier now that we\'ve fixed bugs and crashes with this update. We hope you enjoy the app.
With every update we try to improve your experience and make your business management and invoice creation easier and faster. Thanks for using PayPal business.
In this update you\'ll find improvements and fixes to help make it easier for you to manage your business and PayPal account. Enjoy the PayPal business app.
In this release, we\'ve fixed bugs and error messages to help improve your experience when sending an invoice. Thanks for using PayPal business.
